meanings.definition: A hormone that stimulates growth in animals and humans.
meanings.sent1: The somatotrophins in my body help me grow taller.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study somatotrophins to understand how to support healthy growth in children.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could sprinkle somatotrophins on my plants to make them grow faster!
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted like somatotrophins, encouraging growth and progress in the team.
meanings.sent5: The somatotrophins surged through his body, fueling his rapid growth spurt.

meanings.definition: Substances that promote growth and development in the body.
meanings.sent1: Healthy foods contain essential somatotrophins that aid in body development.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often take supplements rich in somatotrophins to enhance their performance.
meanings.sent3: The gym felt like a magical place where somatotrophins were sprinkled everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Laughter and joy acted as somatotrophins, fostering a sense of growth and connection.
meanings.sent5: The somatotrophins worked silently within her, shaping her into a stronger and healthier individual.
